title: PC Freezing while playing league?
body:
Hi, I've been experiencing freezes in league when playing. I don't have problems with other games such as BF4 and such.
The freeze is so bad to a point where I have to hold the power button to restart my PC. I just want to know is there a fix for this? 
Also, this happened only after the patch 5.10. I have reinstalled my drivers, updated my windows, ran a hardware diagnostics and reinstalled the game but it still happens.
MY PC specs are
Windows 8.1 
i7-4790
8gb ram
GTX 745
250gb SSD

replies.body:
What do you mean by "freezes"? Is this FPS related, or game logic related?

How long does this regularly take to happen? Does it happen with every game? Test it out in Customs if you must.

Freeze as in, client and whole PC freeze.  When it happens, everything just stops and I can't even alt tab out. It regularly happened after the 5.1 patch, and on Nami, zyra games(support). Before that, I was able to play normally

Not even the good ol' Ctrl+Alt+Del doesn't work?

I really just want to see if it's your entire computer or just League.
It's the entire computer. Ctrl + Alt + Del doesn't help. Do you think its a memory leak?

You know, it might be. When I was playing before, I decided to open up Task Manager and saw that League was taking up *all* of my RAM. Not that it was slowing down or anything, but I do see how something like this could be causing issues on other computers.

Have you tried force-closing the client after the game begins loading? It's not required to play the game, and takes up a huge chunk of memory just sitting there, so it might be worth force-closing it via Task Manager as soon as the game begins loading. Be warned, though, you won't go into the post-game lobby (thus not be able to honour or report any players) and you'll have to re-log.

The shortcut to Task Manager in Windows is Ctrl+Shift+Esc.
I'll try it... I hope it helps. Thanks

I'll be awaiting your reply.

In the meantime, look over [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes).

Best of luck.
its still happening... I think it helps if I spectate a game first before I actually play?

Did you look over [the page I just linked you to](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)? Have you tried repairing your client (back up your item sets first!)?
Yep. I repaired and tried everything there... I think I'll just wait for next patch...

Might be a memory leak somewhere on your computer, *caused* by League running. Have you tried glancing at your Task Manager while League is open, to check how much RAM you still have? League should only take around 2GB at most. Other applications should not have their memory usage increase [by a substantial amount, ie. greater than a gigabyte] when League is opened.
Thanks for your help man... i patched it to the latest LoL patch but still happens. Definitely something wrong with my pc...

Have you tried uninstalling your anti-virus/firewall while playing? I mean uninstalling, not just disabling.

Have you tried running it in admin mode while also doing this?
